I had to return ‘em.  Beautiful shoes though.
Very impressed with the look and quality
Excellent. Thank you.
Great buy professional look. Like to see more colors other than the black, brown and beige.
Great shoes, great look
Shoes are great and are comfortable. But it advertised the soles as leather and turns out that the soles are rubber. Probably going to return them.
This shoe is dark blue with a black toe. Great fit

I was really feeling the shoe design in the photo advertisement, so I ordered a size 11 and when I received them I felt bamboozled. The shoes have the same kool looking leather print, but they are VERY LONG and VERY POINTY.  I repeat they are "very long & very pointy" LIKE A COWBOY BOOT. The seller is basically showing a product photo of a shoe that doesn't look like the actual shoe. I hate to be a "negative Johnny" but I had to send me back for a refund, I'm not a shoe snob, but the difference in shoe appearance was just way to different.
DIDN'T GET THE EXACT BROWN COLOR IN THE PIC. GOT A LITTLE DARKER SHADE. BUT FITS GREAT, LOOKS GREAT. SATISFIED. GOOD BUY
I bought 10 WIDE and somehow it is narrower than other shoes I have that are not wide. Extremely disappointing especially for the price and since I bought 2!
Product was everything It was supposed to be!!
I was miss guided by size, the note I read, “run big”.

Very thin leather that will crease instantly making it look really beat up from 1 wear. The leather doesn’t take a polish, it strips the paint from the low quality thin leather. Highest quality part of the shoe is the black leather outsole.
Beautiful and elegant and absolutely worth the price tag. Good quality leather &  beautiful color and elegantly stitched...fine craftmenship.

评论概述: The color is not like the pictures...
评论详情: The color is darker than in pictures. I run into this problem frequently with dress boots. I have included pics when the sun is not shining on them. When you are indoors they are a darkera brown. They do look good on me. I wish they were that bright orange color but they are not. Only when you take a picture of them. The human eye does not see it the same way as a camera lense. But other than that they are AWESOME. One problem is the fact that they only come in narrow for my size. I usually wear an 8 but for these I ordered a 9.5 because of them being narrow. I also put shoe trees in them and it helped widen them a little. Plus they are more comfortable after being broken in. At first I wasn't sure I could wear these things but now I like them. For the first two weeks i didn't know how i felt about them. So break them in! Also the soles are non slip rubber...
Excelente calidad, la talla se ajustó exactamente a lo previsto. Lucen espectaculares.
I use this shoe for business and church.
They are comfortable. They arrived on time and they were very well packaged. 10/10 would buy again.

These shoes wore very well through all of the events of the holidays, and a wedding.  They are comfortable to wear all night, they are well-made and they are good for dancing since they have leather soles and heels. I've just polished them up since it will be a bit before I wear them again and they take the polish perfectly. I will buy more from this manufacturer.

I love these shoes. A 1/2 size up from 13 1/2 would have been better, I think. The only problem is that the bridge is a little snug, when I walk in them. I hope they break in nicely and not deform at the bridge. I'll follow up on these and let you know how hey turn out. like I said though, "Love these shoes!"
Comfortable and stylish!

Im a flight attendant and comfort and presentability is very important. I was pleasantly surprised how comfortable those shoes are. I work 6-9 hour flights and shoes are great and comfortable. And they look stunning

My husband really loved them, the only thing we was invited to an event, and he wasn't able to wear them because, the ordering and delivery process was a bit too long but other than that we loved the shoes.
Los zapatos me encantan pero me mandaron el tamaño equivocado yo pedí size 9 W y me mandaron 101/2 muy grande y si tienen 9 W sera  mejor para mi gracias

The quality fit is great
These are great looking shoes. Aligátor shoes were instile 75 years ago, are in style now, and will be in stile 75 years from now. Love this shoe!!!
Beautiful shoe except for the unusually long nose tip.

I bought these shoes for our daughter’s wedding. Great look. Great fit. And my niece told me my shoes had serious drip. I think that is a compliment. I don’t get to wear them that often but when I do I feel great.

Not entirely sure how, but both of the shoelaces snapped in half under light pressure. Company did not send me a replacement pair of shoelaces. I know they're cheap, but if you spend this much money on shoes you think they would have quality shoelaces. The shoes on the other hand are very nice
Excelente calzado de piel de cocodrilo 🐊

I took a chance on this brand because they offered really good looking blue leather dress shoes, which is what I was looking for. I was shocked at how good they were when they arrived - perfect fit, excellent quality leather and polish, and they were very well built. I liked them so much I bought the same ones in tan. Again, perfect. I then bought two more pairs in black. Again, perfect (well, one pair is still in the box, but I assume it’s perfect). I have been loyal to one famous brand for about 15 years, but I like these just as much AND they are significantly less expensive! I wear business attire every day, and I’m a bit of a shoe snob.  I do wish they made this same shoe without a brogue pattern. It’s not a big deal because it is fairly subtle, and the rest of the design is quite sleek. If you’re on the fence about trying these, take a leap. You will be pleasantly surprised.
My clients love my shoes!!  I’ve gotten soooo many compliments!  I ordered 2 pair!!!!  Love these shoes!!!
No me gusto por q es demasiado puntiagudo y súper duro.

I purchased these shoes because I was the best man in a wedding. The groom sent the pic without a description of why. I purchased them because I thought it was replacing the shoes for the tux. Another person in the wedding did the same.  I later found that he was just showing that he would be wearing them. I returned the shoes....not because of anything wrong.  They were comfortable, stylish, great construction, and prestigious.  If I had to dress like a affluent gentleman, I would have kept them. I dress business casual for work therefore I would not have gotten much use out of them.  But I will say, these shoes were sexy....I may buy them again once I change my style.
El diseño muy original, comodidad espectacularidad!!!

These shoes are amazingly comfortable. The leather is supple and beautiful. Every day I wear them I get multiple compliments. They are worth every penny in comfort looks and style. Cut corners some place else

I received these as a gift from my girlfriend. My half size was not available, so she ordered the next size up. They fit perfectly! We all shrink over time, and since I'm an avid walker, I've gone from 5' 9 and 1/2 inches to a little less than 5' 7 inches over the years. My girlfriend loves everything about me, except my current height ( she's almost as tall as I am). Now she can wear her stylish high heels when we go out! I've never had elevator shoes before, and now she's no longer taller than I at social gatherings. She's happier and so am I !!!!

评论概述: They look great but are mad uncomfortable
评论详情: I work at a restaurant and I was searching nonslip shoes. I think these are but idk tbh if they’re nonslip. I slip and slide all over. But they’re so effing pretty and I get so many compliments the blisters on my feet and the feeling of them going numb after wearing them for hours is worth it. They don’t really hurt anymore. I’ve stretched them out I guess with my big a** feet. The first week was rough tho. I didn’t have any other shoes to wear to work so I had to bear it. But after a few weeks the soles are still in tact, I haven’t had to glue anything back together, and I know I look fly af slangin plates at alllll my tables. 9.9/10. Just cuz they are very not comfy.
Exceptional style, fit and finish.

评论概述: Don’t fit, pretty shoe,  if I can’t adjust I will return them
评论详情: Don’t fit, pretty shoe,  if I can’t adjust I will return them

评论概述: Good value for your money and they are beautiful.
评论详情: Just what I had hoped for.....

Right out of the box they fit perfectly. Although, they are made in China, the quality is still there. A slight draw back, I must say, is they are very slippery on carpeting. Once I wore them outside and scuffed the soles a bit that seemed to rectify the slippery effect. The touch of blue on these shoes is subtile, but gives the shoe a very dressy look. I would recommend these if you’re looking for a classy dress shoe.
Well crafted and comfortable shoes.
Great look too. I get a lot of compliments on these shoes. I wear these for special occasions. They also go well with a dark pair of blue jeans.
If you want a shoe that fits your feet and that’s soft with a leather lining this is the shoe for you!

Shoes of a refined nature that are ideally suited for wearing with a tuxedo. I've tried on a number of different pairs of tuxedo shoes, and these are by far the most comfortable ones. I am overjoyed to see that they are available in broad sizes, as shoes with such a width are notoriously difficult to find, particularly dress shoes. The alligator design is one of the best i have seen. I was also able to take out the insoles and replace them with my own orthodontics with very little work on my part. That would make for the ideal shoe!!
Five Stars. Excellent fit. Lightweight and comfortable. Great style. Nice looking. Very Good quality. Good Value for money.

I love the design, and they look even more shiny after polishing. These are 11.5, and I am a size 12 normally, but these do fit. Great for someone who needs new dress Shoes for an occasion that requires them. These are well built and have a nice thick Sole, but aren't to slick either. Not that you're going to necessarily walk in the elements with them, but a little parking lot ice hasn't tripped me up while wearing these.
Looks excellent, fits excellent, feel excellent when walking!

I really liked the unique coloring of these shoes. The quality of the product matches the price, the only thing missing is a major name brand - which no one sees anyway. A few notes:  -Quality laces -Leather upper -Nonslip heel -Shoe horn included -Shoe bags included  They were a big snug as many dress shoes are. I put cedar shoe trees in them prior to my first use, and after wearing a couple of times they fit perfectly.

These are beautiful. They look amazing from top to bottom. The sizing is very accurate and they fit as expected. I did expect them to be a little tight in the toe just from the style so if you have wide feet then maybe order up a size. Of course I wouldn't expect to walk a lot while wearing them. The part around the ankles can be a little unforgiving with a lot of walking.
I am needing one in size 7
Shoes looks gorgeous.  But was not comfortable in terms of material.  I had to return it.  The material was biting into my skin.

评论概述: One of the best pair of dress shoes that I now own
评论详情: I have to wear dress shoes for work and have several different pairs, but I was looking for a more formal oxford to wear occasionally.  I had seen these and decided to order them.  When I had received them I was completely impressed with how well made these shoes are.  The leather work and the stitching is far superior than any other pairs of dress shoes that I have ever bought before.  This brand is one that I will absolutely look for and by again.  Truly a great buy for an amazing pair of dress shoes.  I hope that this helps.

I had never heard of Jepsengord shoes before.  I'm sorry I hadn't because these are very nice dress shoes.  The craftsmanship and quality are excellent.  These shoes look and feel far more expensive than they actually are.  These are very nice looking, quality dress shoes.  The are comfortable and look very sharp.  My only complaint is that my feet are wide but these shoes don't have a wide open to purchase.  Otherwise, these are highly recommended.  They are worth every penny and you will not be disappointed.
Fits good

评论概述: scuff easily, feel and look amazing
评论详情: first time buying such high priced dress shoes, and overall I'm impressed. they look and feel amazing, you can definitely see a lot of time and craft went into creating them, and they even come with velvet bags to hold the shoes and a shoe horn. I was able to wear them to my office and they were rather comfortable. the biggest problem that stops them from being a 4 star, when I went into the office, I the bottom of the shoe would get heavily scrapped after walking in the parking garage. I wasn't dragging my feet or purposely stepping on rocks, and so it is dissapointing to see a shoe with such care and cost get easily beaten up. besides that, def a game changer for my closet, would recommend to everyone in the market for a nice brown oxford

These are very nice looking shoes. They  go very narrow in the toe so if you have a wide foot like my husband I would suggest getting larger size we did and they are still a little tight fit for him. Very nice shoe.

Well packaged. Each shoe has individual sleeve for protection. I was surprised at  the quality and craftsmanship of the shoe. Its a good comfortable fit from the first time i put them on. The weather is soft yet appears durable. Will be a nice compliment to a suit or dress affair. I would add however the color was bit different than what appeared on the site. Still... a fine shoe.

评论概述: Quality formal shoes that cost less than half of known brands
评论详情: As a diplomat of 14 years, I have had my fair share of formal dress shoes over the years. Since the brand is unknown I had my doubts but these clearly exceeded my expectations.  The insole is made up of puffy, leathery material which is very comfortable (think of hush puppies insoles). The fit was true to size and with normal walk it did not get the "top creases" that you would sometimes get with some shoes.  If we would say 1 for the shininess of a matte shoe and 10 for a ceremonial super-shiny one, I would say this would land somewhere around 7, which is perfect for the business attire.  Overall, I would put this on par with my Paul Stuart or even Church's pairs in terms of craftsmanship, however the durability of the material is something that I will only be able to say in a year.  The shoes come with very presentable box, individual shoe bags and a shoe horn. Some extras that might not matter, but show that there certainly is attention to detail.  Very happy with the looks, the fit and the feel of these, would highly recommend.
Beautiful color of the leather. Fit nicely and look amazing with a suit or formal wear! True to size and comfortable
These shoes check off every box for selecting a quality pair of dress shoes, comfort, stitching, heel size, shine, laces, etc. Highly recommend!

评论概述: Very high quality material, look better in person than the pictures, real leather sole
评论详情: These are shoes for the ages. The first thing you notice when you open the box, is each shoe is individually cradled in a soft bag for protection.  When you pull them out, you are immediately struck by the quality of materials. No rubber sole that looks like it should be on a pair of slippers. These have high quality leather soles. If you've never owned a pair of shoes with real leather soles, be careful - they're slippery for the first few hours!  Every stitch is in place, every fold is perfect as they should be for shoes of this price range. The interior is soft and comfortable, and with a little break in time you'll love them. They are a perfect size, so if you normally expect shoes to be a little wide, you might be disappointed with these.  Overall, I'm impressed. Try them out, you'll be surprised at how many people notice your shoes that never did before.  Recommended.
These shoes are well made and very comfortable.  Shoes are true to size and look great.  I am very happy with these shoes. I will be getting others.  Highly recommend.
I do like shoes like this . It's elegant and very comfortable .

评论概述: I have not worn something like these since the mid 80's!!!
评论详情: What can I say...When I was in high school (graduated in 1985), shoes like these were my favorites. I had them in light gray, burgundy, brown, in as many colors as I could get a hold off. The soles were hard and slippery for a purpose...DANCING!!! I remember them being in the $40 to $80 range...When I came across these, I could not pass the opportunity to get me a pair just for the sake of remembering old times...I'm glad I did...These are very nicely made shoes and look beautiful! The soles on these I would say that are appropriate for my age, kind of rubbery, flexible and slip resistant (not really for dancing). I love these shoes, but while I can still wear them comfortably enough, I kind of regret not ordering them in size 8. Ordered 8.5 thinking they would have been too tight on size 8. So they fit slightly too large. The shoes come in a real nice box, each one in its own cloth bag. Highly recommend these shoes!

My husband started singing I’m a classic man as soon as he tried them on. These beauties have surpassed my expectations. They arrived very quickly. The came in a beautiful box with dust bags for each shoe. A Shoehorn was also included. I give these beauties 10 stars!!!! They are worth every dollar!!!!!!!

These are great pairs of leather oxford shoes. They are very comfortable and seem to be very well-constructed. The Navy color is beautiful and very unique for a relatively formal shoe like this. I can wear it instead of black oxfords on most occasions. The medallion on the toe cap makes it a bit more casual but still very stylish. I typically wear US size 10 dress shoes so I have ordered 10. The fit is nice and snug which is something I prefer as the leather seems to stretch.  I would love to hear more about how these shoes are constructed though. The bottom of the sole indicates these are soles and the uppers are handmade but how are the soles attached to the uppers? Blake stitch? Goodyear welt? Glue/cement? at this price point ($180) I think this information would have been very helpful.  I sincerely hope that you will find my review helpful.

I'm giving this shoe 4 stars because they are very nice.  They are clean and they come with individual, material sleeves that protect the shoes while packed in luggage while traveling.  I do have wide feet, and I'm going to look into shoe stretchers.  But overall, I can't where these currently out of the box.They are nice shoes, though.

Let me start by saying these shows are the best looking dress shoes I have ever worn.  They are made from quality materials and look and feel great.  The main downside is they are on the narrow side.  So, if you have wide feet, these will be tight.  The soles are also slick, so you'll have to be careful until they are worn enough to not bee slippery.  Overall, these are quality shoes, but the narrow factor should be considered when buying them.
Absolutely gorgeous shoes.  I got these for my son for his wedding and they looked great.  Very well made and fit well.

评论概述: Beautiful shoes that are surprisingly comfortable.  Shoes for a gentleman!
评论详情: I've been approached about several job vacancies lately.  You'd be surprised how persistent these people are.  Despite my best efforts, a few of them have managed to get in touch with me and now I've got some interviews scheduled.  I figured that I needed some new shoes to go with my suits and ordered these up.These are downright epic shoes.  The quality of the materials is the first thing you notice.  The leather uppers looked amazing, but what really impressed me was the soles.  No Vibram soles here--these are legit leather soles.  There's plenty of shoes that are content to go with a rubber sole.  The quality leather sole on these shoes is all you need to know about how serious they are.The presentation is first class as well.  Even the shoebox is gorgeous--so much so they've I've used it as a backdrop for my review photographs lately.  Shoe bags are included as is a shoe horn.  I had never heard of this brand previously, but they do amazing work in every part of the process--from the soles of the shoes to the box they're sold in.On top of everything, they're surprisingly comfortable.  I tried them on for the purpose of reviewing them but got distracted by something else.  I ended up wearing them for several hours.  They won't replace my bedroom slippers but for dress shoes they're amazingly comfortable.  More significantly, they're really comfortable right out of the box.  Most dress shoes even if they end up being comfortable need some 'breaking in'.  I'm sure these shoes will only get more comfortable after a few wearings.These are legit gentleman's shoes.  No matter what you wear with them, they let the world know that you're a important man with impeccable taste in footwear.  I've already picked up another pair from this brand and it won't be the last.  My highest recommendations--these are amazing shoes.

Beyond my expectations was my first feeling when I tried them. I'm always anxious about clothes and shoes ordered online, but these shoes not only fit really well, but they are also comfortable and high quality.  Usually pictures look much better than the actual product, but in this case, the product looks just like the pictures. They are well made and stylish.  I am very happy about the purchase. First day I wore them, I received three compliments from two ladies and one gentleman. Both unknown people, which gives more credibility. I'm not that vain, but I can't deny that I was happy to hear the comments.

评论概述: Real thick leather and great construction.
评论详情: I got these Jepsengord Men's Classical Dress Oxford Shoes Calfskin Brogue Lace Up Formal Oxfords Leather Soled Shoes, for myself. I wear a US Size 11 and that is what I ordered. I was worried at first, because they were really tight, I had to remove the laces and relace the shoes. I found that this was because of the leather. This is real Leather, not thin strips, but solid. I inserted my foot using their supplied shoehorn and my size 11 foot fit perfectly inside the shoe. I am a D width and there was plenty of room and the toe cap was also had ample space for my toes. I am sure as I wear them (to break them in) the tightness when inserting my foot, will ease up (as the leather conforms to my foot). Let me state that there is no discomfort, they are just stiff as you open the shoe to insert your foot. I like the construction of this shoe as it shows real craftsmanship. I also liked the included shoe bags, which are great when I pack them as I travel. I like this dress shoe and it will, in my opinion, look great with my slacks and suits.

评论概述: Crushing disappointment.  Good if you’re an elf.
评论详情: These are well-made handsome looking shoes. They would be fantastic with a suit. My husband was really looking forward to these shoes. They are just classic men’s shoes.  Unfortunately his excitement about the shoes was crushed dramatically when he tried to put them on. They are incredibly narrow. As you can see, from the pictures, I used a tape measure to measure the widest part of the shoe and it’s just about 3 inches. My husband‘s foot is not under 3 inches wide. I measured towards the tip and it gets even narrower. If you’re an elf, maybe this will work for you. But if you have a regular men’s foot - and certainly if you have a wide foot - you will never get your foot in the shoe. My husband struggled and struggled because he really wanted these to fit and he never did get his foot in the shoe.  I received this item for free, but the opinions are my own and are honest.

I recently had a custom-tailored suite made in royal blue, and have been looking for the right pair of dress shoes to go with it.  I'm so glad I found this pair!  They are well-made and very expensive-looking and just stunning.  They arrived just in time for an event to which I needed to wear my new suit, and while I did get some compliments on the suit itself, I got even more on the shoes!  They stole the show.They were comfortable right out of the box, although I did need to use the handy and provided shoehorn to get them on the first time.  They were packaged especially well; in a sturdy shoe box, each shoe stuffed with tissue paper to keep their shape, and each individually placed within a cloth drawstring bag inside of the box.Quality all the way.  You won't be disappointed with these shoes.

评论概述: The fit is right on and they're comfortable.
评论详情: ~~Pros~~ + These are really good looking shoes. I love them and have received compliments every time I've worn them. + I ordered 3cm larger than my foot measurement and they fit perfectly. + The insoles are comfortable. + After breaking them in they are really comfortable. + The shoes look really slick! I love the blueish to black design. + The shoelace holes have rivets on the back. I love that and they'll not pull the leather.  ~~Cons~~ - None. Just break them in for a few days and they'll be perfect!  RATING SYSTEM ----- Diamond's Star Rating System (What do my star ratings mean?): 1 STAR - Completely unusable, would request a refund 2 STAR - Meets minimum viable product requirements, wouldn't purchase it again 3 STAR - It does what it should, but in a non-spectacular way, I may recommend it, but definitely with reservations 4 STAR - I like it. It is solid quality and delivers as advertised, I would purchase it again and recommend it to a friend 5 STAR - I love it. It meets or exceeds all of my expectations and is high quality, I would purchase it again and would openly promote it to friends
These shoes surprised me with the level of quality and craftsmanship. They are rigid dress shoes that will likely require some wearing to get comfortable.

评论概述: These shoes are for people who appreciate quality.
评论详情: The shoes will transform your wardrobe.  Great quality for the price... remember hand made it doesn't get any better .!!  Give them a try,.. and see if you can find a better shoe anywhere.!!

评论概述: Beautiful shoe that is very comfortable to wear
评论详情: When I first came across these shoes, the navy blue shoe looked perfect to me. Well, when I received the shoes they actually look even better in person than they did in the listing which I didn't really think was possible. Somehow the blue color is even more striking in person. The shoes are very well crafted with a high attention to detail. For example, the holes for the laces have a metal eyelet on the inside. The shoe lining is ample with a very nice padding for the insole. The design is classic but the color is modern, nice mix of the two in these shoes.
